text: Today’s Chinese article looks at common items to have in a bedroom.Notice that many different measure words are being used.今天，给大家介绍一下我的房间。房间里放着一张床，一张桌子。墙上挂着一张地图。地上有两个篮球，一个足球和一双鞋。因为我喜欢旅游，也喜欢打篮球和踢足球，所以我把地图、篮球和足球都放在房间里。Today, let me introduce my room to everyone. In my room there is a bed and a table.There is a map hanging on the wall.There are two basketballs, a football and a pair of shoes on the ground.Because I like to travel, play basketball, and play football, I put maps, basketballs and a football in the room.1 – 房间的墙上挂着什么？a. 足球b. 篮球c. 鞋子d. 地图2 – 地上有几个篮球？a. 没有b. 两个c. 一个d. 三个1. d2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
